name: Croconaw
flavorText:
If it loses a
fang, a new one
grows back in its place. There are
always 48 fangs
lining its mouth.

previous.name: Totodile
previous.flavorText:
Its well-developed
jaws are powerful
and capable of crushing anything.
Even its trainer
must be careful.

next.name: Feraligatr
next.flavorText:
When it bites with
its massive and
powerful jaws, it shakes its head
and savagely tears
its victim up.
